channel.description: Because in all fairness, there is enough...

item.title: By: Jeff Simoneaux
item.dc:creator: Jeff Simoneaux
item.description: This absolutely truthful, there exists enough resources in this world for all of us to live very well and have much food and shelter but because of our selfish nature many starve while others sit on their thrown of cash. Read a great new book by my colleage Jeffrey Michael Simoneaux and let's make a change THE TRUTH The Illumination of Conscience
item.content:encoded: This absolutely truthful, there exists enough resources in this world for all of us to live very well and have much food and shelter but because of our selfish nature many starve while others sit on their thrown of cash. Read a great new book by my colleage Jeffrey Michael Simoneaux and let’s make a change THE TRUTH The Illumination of Conscience
